title: Todd Howard Answers YOUR Starfield Questions - Kinda Funny Xcast Ep. 143
description:
This episode is sponsored by BetterHelp — go to http://betterhelp.com/kindafunny to get 10% off your first month.

Starfield Game Director Todd Howard joins the show to answer your questions from Xbox and Bethesda summer direct.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:01:26 - Happy Belated Fathers Day!
00:04:29 - Housekeeping
00:05:45 - An Interview w/ Todd Howard
00:10:25 - Accessibility
00:11:54 - Character Creation, Skills, and Backgrounds
00:14:40 - Fishing?!
00:16:06 - 1,000+ Planets
00:19:16 - ADS
00:20:22 - Diversity of Exploration
00:24:36 - Companions
00:27:36 - Music
00:30:46 - Space Ships
00:35:40 - Tech & Performance
00:38:42 - Side Quests
00:41:13 - Mods
00:42:36 - Outposts
00:44:21 - Where Todd is at Months Away from Launch

Epic Creator Code: KindaFunny
